responses: Table tennis as we know it today, started in the late 1880s in England
Table tennis had different names like: Whiff-Waff, Indoor Tennis, Gossima and Ping Pong
In China table tennis is a national sport and they repeatedly win World championships
There are more than 1500 varieties of tabble tennis rubbers
A table tennis paddle must have one red-side and one black-side
Table tennis is the most popular indoor sport of the world
